text: Patient presented with progressive neck mass. CT neck w/ contrast shows 3.2 cm enhancing lesion at right tonsillar pillar. No airway compromise. Recommend ENT evaluation.
Pathology report: Biopsy from left maxillary sinus. Sections reveal poorly differentiated squamous cell carcinoma. p16 positive. Surgical margins not applicable.
Patient seen in oncology clinic today. Reports mild dysphagia and odynophagia. Weight stable. Plan to initiate cisplatin-based chemoradiotherapy. Labs within acceptable limits.
Operative note: Right partial pharyngectomy performed. Frozen section margins negative. Estimated blood loss 120 mL. Patient tolerated procedure well and transferred to PACU.
